doc:
Mrs. Leslie Carter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mrs._Leslie_Carter 0 Caroline Louise Dudley (June 10, 1857 – November 13, 1937) was an American silent film and stage actress who found fame on Broadway through collaborations with impresario David Belasco. She was a strikingly beautiful and vivacious performer, known as "The American Sarah Bernhardt", who continued to act under her married name, Mrs. Leslie Carter, even after her sensational divorce. Caroline_Louise_Dudley ( June_10_,_1857 – November_13_,_1937 ) was an_American_silent_film_and_stage_actress who found fame on Broadway through collaborations with impresario_David_Belasco . She was a_strikingly_beautiful_and_vivacious_performer , known as " The_American_Sarah_Bernhardt " , who continued_to_act under her_married_name , Mrs._Leslie_Carter , even after her_sensational_divorce .
